title: New: Lovelier Other – Hidden Shelters
body:
With their mysterious, enchanting imagery and current anonymity (although being the internet detective that I am, it didn’t take me too long to find out their identities), **Lovelier Other** clocked up an impressive 12,000 plays of their debut track, _Leave This Behind_, which surfaced toward the tail end of last year.

New cut _Hidden Shelters_ picks up where their debut left off, with floaty-ethereal pop, almost too slick and sonically perfect for words, from the smooth vocals to the soaring string sections. Check it out underneath.
